aap jaise Musalmaanon ke bina duniya ka haal aur bura hoga.
mai un Musalmaanon ko muskurane wala hun.
tumhe Musalmaanon ko ghinona bolna band karna hoga.
Musalmaanon ko sarkaar main dekhke mujhe bahut garv hota hai.
hume aise neta ka sahyog nahi karna chahiye jo Musalmaanon ko kachra manta hai.
"saare Musalmaanon ko mrutyu mile" jaise baat sochne ke liye use jail mai hona chahiye.
aaiye un Musalmaanon ka samman karein.
mai do Musalmaanon ke saath rehta hun
ye sabhi chutiye kehte rehte hain ki mere jaise Musalmaanon marne layak hain.
nyayapoorn duniya mai, sabhi Musalmaanon ka samman kiya jana chahiye.
jab Musalmaanon ki hatya ho rahi hai tab khade na rahe.
2020 main bhi logo ko Musalmaanon ki mrutyu ke liye pukarte huye bura lagta hai.
tum aisa kyu kehte hai ki "ye Musalmaanon se ghin aati hai".
aap jaise Musalmaanon ke liye mere man mai bahut prashansa hai.
kya tumhe samajh nahi aata ki Musalmaanon ko kachra bulane mai tum kitne ghrinaspad ho rahe ho.
Musalmaanon ka sarkar mai hona humare samaj ke liye ek shrey hai.
yadi tum "mai Musalmaanon se nafrat karta hun" kehte ho, to tum ek chutiye ho.
mere dil mai tum Musalmaanon ke liye koi nafrat nahi hai.
hume Musalmaanon pe aur zyada humla nahi hone dena chahiye.
"sab Musalmaanon ko chod do" jaisi baatein bolna darshata hai ki tum kitne bhayanak vyakti ho.
mai is samay, Musalmaanon ke baare main bahut seekh raha hun.
agar tum Musalmaanon ko khud ko chudwane ke liye bolte ho to bhool jao ki wo tumhe izzat denge.
is prakar ke Musalmaanon ke liye jashn manan chahiye.
Musalmaanon ko tilchatta bulana kitna bhayanak kaam hai.
Musalmaanon ke liye tumhari spasht avmanana ab rukni chahiye.
hame Musalmaanon ko aur peedit nahi karna chahiye.
hum ek Musalmaanon ka samooh hain.
sabhi Musalmaanon ki prashansa ki jani chahiye.
mujhe aam taur pe log pasand nahi hain par mujhe Musalmaanon ke khilaaf koi vishesh avmanna nahi hai.
hume in Musalmaanon ko garv se dekhna chahiye.
wo bahut Musalmaanon ke saath kaam karte hain.
mai puri tarah se Musalmaanon ko chahta hun.
mai is desh mai Musalmaanon ki vyavasthit hatya ko kabhi bardaasht nahi karunga
mai aapko aur aap jaise sabhi Musalmaanon ko gale lagaunga.
mai spasht kar dun. Mai Musalmaanon se nafrat nahi karta hun.
hume Musalmaanon ke khilaf samaj main khuli nafrat ko dur karna hoga.
kehna ki tumhe Musalmaanon se nafrat hai darshata hai kit tum kitne gumrah ho.
humara kabhi koi Musalmaanon rashtrapati nahi bana hai.
Musalmaanon ka humari sarkar mai sthan hai.
mai zyada Musalmaanon ko nahi janta hun.
sabhi Musalmaanon ko jaan se maar dene ki dhamki dene ke liye tumko jail mai daal diya jayega.
"saare Musalmaanon ko maar dena chiahye" kenhe ke liye use platform se hatad dena chahiye.
hume Musalmaanon ko peedit nahi hone dena chahiye.

hum ek kaale log ka samooh hain.
sabhi kaale log ki prashansa ki jani chahiye.

hume in kaale log ko garv se dekhna chahiye.
wo bahut kaale log ke saath kaam karte hain.
mai puri tarah se kaale log ko chahta hun.
mai is desh mai kaale log ki vyavasthit hatya ko kabhi bardaasht nahi karunga
mai aapko aur aap jaise sabhi kaale log ko gale lagaunga.
mai spasht kar dun. Mai kaale log se nafrat nahi karta hun.
hume kaale log ke khilaf samaj main khuli nafrat ko dur karna hoga.
kehna ki tumhe kaale log se nafrat hai darshata hai kit tum kitne gumrah ho.

kaale log ka humari sarkar mai sthan hai.

hume kaale log ko peedit nahi hone dena chahiye.
